description: The metadata in MTT files can be imported and applied to single files or to files in batch mode, which is useful for marking all company documents at once.

MetadataTouch supports many different file types, including Microsoft Office files ( .DOCX , .DOCM , .XLSX , .XLSM , .PPTX , .PPTM ), OpenDocument files ( .ODT , .ODS , .ODP , .ODG ), and .AVI , .MP4 , .F4V , .WAV , .PNG , .SVG , and .XMP files.
